bill_title: require the Government Operations and Audit Committee to provide oversight to the Board of Regents on issues relating to the university centers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Legislative Planning Committee to provide oversight to the Board of Regents on issues relating to the university centers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-51-1.4 be amended to read: 13-51-1.4. Commencing in 2016 and every ten years 2017 and every year thereafter, the provisions of § 13-51-1.3 shall be reviewed by a special legislative task force consisting of the speaker of the House of Representatives and four other members of the House of Representatives appointed by the speaker of the House of Representatives and the president pro-tempore of the Senate and four other members of the Senate appointed by the president pro-tempore of the Senate. Not all of the members from the House of Representatives or the Senate may be of the same party the Legislative Planning Committee. The special legislative task force Legislative Planning Committee shall review the appropriateness of the provisions of § 13-51-1.3 and make recommendations to the Legislature regarding any revisions, additions, or deletions to the various conditions contained in § 13-51-1.3. The committee shall, at the same time, conduct a review of each of the university centers, the off-campus sites in Pierre, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls where courses are being offered, and report the committee findings and recommendations to the Legislature. Section 2. That § 13-48A-7 be amended to read: 13-48A-7. The Board of Regents and the Board of Education shall each provide to the Legislative Planning Committee an annual accountability report as determined by the committee. The annual accountability report provided by the Board of Regents shall include a financial report on each of the university centers located in Pierre, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls as provided in section 3 of this Act. Section 3. That chapter 13-48A be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The financial report on each of the university centers located in Pierre, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls required in section 2 of this Act shall contain a summary statement of the financial condition of the university center that includes the following: (1) The beginning and ending cash balances for each of the preceding two fiscal years; (2) A detailed comparative statement of actual revenue for each of the two preceding fiscal years, and the estimated revenue of the current fiscal year and the next fiscal year. The statements of revenue and estimated revenue shall be classified by source. The existing sources of revenue shall be analyzed as to their sustainability, and explanations shall be provided for any new sources of revenue; (3) A detailed comparative statement of expenditures for each of the preceding two fiscal years, the budget of the current fiscal year, and the budget for the next fiscal year. The statements of expenditures shall be classified as personal services, capital outlay, state institution support, state institution services, and operating expenditures, and include the number of full-time equivalent employees; and (4) Any other financial information as requested by the Legislative Planning Committee.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Government Operations and Audit Committee to provide oversight to the Board of Regents on issues relating to the university centers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-51-1.4 be amended to read: 13-51-1.4. Commencing in 2016 and every ten years 2017 and every year thereafter, the provisions of § 13-51-1.3 shall be reviewed by a special legislative task force consisting of the speaker of the House of Representatives and four other members of the House of Representatives appointed by the speaker of the House of Representatives and the president pro-tempore of the Senate and four other members of the Senate appointed by the president pro-tempore of the Senate. Not all of the members from the House of Representatives or the Senate may be of the same party the Government Operations and Audit Committee. The special legislative task force committee shall review the appropriateness of the provisions of § 13-51-1.3 and make recommendations to the Legislature regarding any revisions, additions, or deletions to the various conditions contained in § 13-51-1.3. The committee shall, at the same time, conduct a review of each of the university centers, the off-campus sites in Pierre, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls where courses are being offered, and report the committee findings and recommendations to the Legislature. Section 2. That § 13-48A-7 be amended to read: 13-48A-7. The Board of Regents and the Board of Education shall each provide to the Legislative Planning Government Operations and Audit Committee an annual accountability report as determined by the committee. The annual accountability report provided by the Board of Regents shall include a financial report on each of the university centers located in Pierre, Rapid City, and Sioux Falls as prescribed by the auditor general.

First read in Senate and referred to
